mapper.select: select count(*) as totCnt from statistc.requestinfo ri join statistc.user u where u.HR_ORGAN = #{organ} and u.userID = ri.userID and substring(ri.createDate,3,2) = #{month};

select count(*) as totCnt from statistc.requestinfo where substring(createDate,3,2) = #{month} and left(createDate,2) = #{year} and substring(createDate,1,6) not in (select substring(createDate,1,6) from statistc.holiday);
